alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Oneida, western Madison and southeastern Onondaga Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lenox to near Cazenovia to Fabius. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rome, Oneida, Kirkland, Lenox, Verona, Westmoreland, Eaton, Canastota, Hamilton and Sherrill. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
